fieldType.description: Metadata about a particular name field for constructing an input UI.

name.description: The standard English name of this field for this country

required.description: Whether or not this phone field is required

validation.description: Information to use to validate values of this field

pattern.description: A regular expression that will match valid values intended to be used to validate free-form inputs

enum.description: A list of possible values for this field and the normalized value that they map to

aliases.description: A list of possible aliases for this field and the normalized value that they map to

countryToIDDCode.description: Give the mapping from an ISO country code to an international direct dialing code

IDDCodeTocountry.description: Give the reverse mapping from an international direct dialing code to an ISO country code. Since multiple countries share dialing plans, this maps to the default country for each plan

sharedDialingPlans.description: For those dialing plans that support multiple countries, list the countries in that dialing plan

countryCodes.description: The array of ISO codes of the countries that are in that dialing plan

default.description: The ISO code for the default country for that dialing plan
